data.title: Hangman dictionary finder
data.statement:
You are a hangman cheater !
 _____
|/     O 
|     /|\
|     /  \
|_

From a given [[currentHangmanString]], find all the possible words in the given dictionary.
In the  [[currentHangmanString]], "<<_>>" denotes an unknown character ( example : <<h__gm__>> ).
There is at least one possible word in the dictionary.
All words in the dictionary are in lower case, also [[currentHangmanString]] includes only lower case characters and "<<_>>".
Output the valid words in the dictionary order.

Hangman rule : At each attempt if the the final hangman word includes the given character <<X>>, all characters <<X>> will be revealed in the [[currentHangmanString]] at the same time.
Example : 
Final word = <<hangman>>.
current Hangman string = <<h__gm__>>.
play "a" => <<h__gm__>> will become <<ha_gma_>> (all characters "a" are revealed at the same time).

testCases.title: Example
testCases.testIn:
p___
6
pie
pate
pasta
pope
path
paths

testCases.title: Example - val
testCases.testIn:
d___
6
do
date
dates
dead
dolls
doll

testCases.title: Really sure - val
testCases.testIn:
h_r_
5
her
hare
hear
horh
rhea

testCases.title: Many
testCases.testIn:
b___s
9
abets
baste
betas
beast
beats
bats
bat
boll
bolls

testCases.title: Many val
testCases.testIn:
c____s
9
carets
caster
crates
reacts
caters
recast
traces
crate
crests

testCases.title: Bigger hangman
testCases.testIn:
c______________a___
6
counterdemonstritor
counterdemonstrator
countardemonstrator
counterdamonstrator
countercemonstrator
cbebebebebebebeabeb

testCases.title: Bigger hangman - val
testCases.testIn:
______o_a______a___
6
magnetoelectrocally
electromagnetically
electromagneticallo
olectromagnetically
alectromagnetically
cececeocacececeacec

data.constraints:
0 < [[currentHangmanString]].length < 20
0 < [[N]] < 10
1 <= [[M]] <= [[N]] where [[M]] is the number of results to output
data.stubGenerator:
read currentHangmanString:string(64)
read N:int
loop N read word:string(64)
write validWord
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>>  A string [[currentHangmanString]]
<<Line 2:>>  An integer [[N]] for the number of words in the dictionary
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> One [[word]] in the dictionary

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are a hangman cheater !
_____
|/ O
| /|\
| / \
|_

From a given currentHangmanString, find all the possible words in the given dictionary.
In the currentHangmanString, "_" denotes an unknown character ( example : h__gm__ ).
There is at least one possible word in the dictionary.
All words in the dictionary are in lower case, also currentHangmanString includes only lower case characters and "_".
Output the valid words in the dictionary order.

Hangman rule : At each attempt if the the final hangman word includes the given character X, all characters X will be revealed in the currentHangmanString at the same time.
Example :
Final word = hangman.
current Hangman string = h__gm__.
play "a" => h__gm__ will become ha_gma_ (all characters "a" are revealed at the same time).
Input
Line 1: A string currentHangmanString
Line 2: An integer N for the number of words in the dictionary
Next N lines: One word in the dictionary
Output
M lines: One validWord in the dictionary
Constraints
0 < currentHangmanString.length < 20
0 < N < 10
1 <= M <= N where M is the number of results to output
Example
Input
p___
6
pie
pate
pasta
pope
path
paths
Output
pate
path
